Articles.Content:
i'd like to get a fake camera that acts like the flag in ksp. you can place one down anywhere (preferably infront of the kerbal) just for screenshots because i have a project coming up for taking pictures of the estereggs around kerbin and maybe the Mun and others as i get more people aboard and we'd all really like something as simple and silly as a fake camera to put down for our kerbals to "take pics" with.

what i'm thinking of (for design) is just a simple tripod and small camera in a whiteish used box. (burn marks,scratches etc.)

(sorry for title... i'm bad at this "thread" thing >.<)

Edited September 29, 2014 by AntiMatter001
